description:
Karl Robert Steinmetz was an Admiral of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire], and the former captain of the http://anidb.net/ch1488 [Brunhild].
Later promoted to command of his own fleet, he was killed when http://anidb.net/ch1757 [his flagship] was hit and destroyed at the Battle of the Corridor.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Karl Robert Steinmetz
